title: A Peek Beyond the Consequences
description: No longer available: Previous available in BREATHLESS - An Anthology. Due to reader request...this novella has been expanded (tripled in length) and will be release in January of 2015 as  Beyond the Consequences.Anthony Rawlings is a man most women love to hate or hate to love. Domineering yet caring, demanding yet sensual, heâ€™s truly an enigma, but can he be the one Claire needs and deserves? Will she ever truly find happiness with the man who stole her life but gave her the world? For a glimpse into the future, take a Peek Beyond the Consequences, a novella.
author: Aleatha Romig
